resources.string:
Hi, my name is Shelley and I love developing mobile apps! 

 I changed careers from Mechanical Engineering to Software Engineering. 

 I love crafting such as sewing, watercolor and crochet. 

 I love ice skating (both figure skating and hockey), kayaking and running. 

 I really want to learn to sail one day especially on the Charles River and maybe even with MIT! 

 I can't wait to publish my first app 

 I also love attending conventions and networking events.
